text: nishchay ve kshati mein pad gaye, jinhonne allaah se milane ko jhuthala diya, yahaan tak ki jab pralay achaanak unapar aa jaayegee to kahengeh haay! is vishay mein hamase badee chook huee aur ve apane paapon ka bojh apanee peethon par uthaaye honge. to kaisa bura bojh hai, jise ve utha rahe hain
